product.title: HOMEMAXS Hot Roller Clips for Hair Styling ABS Plastic Assorted Color Creates Strong Curls Compatible with Most Curlers 12 Pcs
product.description:
Description

Perfect as replacements for lost or damaged hair curler clips, these hot hair curler clips help you create even, stronger curls. The unique claws have a better holding effect, suitable for holding the curling curlers firmly. When you use it for the first time, if it feels tight, open the teeth of the clip by hand and move it a few times.

Features

-Color: Black, white
-Material: ABS plastic
-Size: About 5.20X6.50X3.70cm/2.04X2.55X1.45in
-The claws of the hot hair curler clips can hold the curling iron firmly in place.
-The unique claws play a better fixing effect, suitable for firmly fixing the curling iron.
-Creates even, stronger curl hairs that are lightweight and easy to use.
-Compatible with most hair curlers to help create beautiful curl hairs.
-Warm tips, when you use it for the first time, if it feels tight, open the teeth of the clip by hand and move it a few times.
